name: github-viewer-stats
description: Small NPM package for collecting your own GitHub statistics

scripts.contribs: node -e "async function run() { console.log(JSON.stringify(await require('./src/contribs')(), null, 2)) } run()"
scripts.repo: run(){ node -e "async function run() { console.log(JSON.stringify(await require('./src/repo')('$1'), null, 2)) } run()"; }; run
scripts.org: run(){ node -e "async function run() { console.log(JSON.stringify(await require('./src/org')('$1'), null, 2)) } run()"; }; run
